messages.content: I want to learn about how the LinkedIn algorithm works. What kinds of posts get better reach, the writing style,  and any other specifics which I can optimize for my post. Be very comprehensive, the writing style, the length, the attachments, the time at which the post is posted, the tone of the post, time gaps between posts, look into absolutely everything. I want to be able to optimize my posts for the best reach while ensuring it is getting to the right audience (recruiters) and is appealing to them.

<research_plan>
  <title>Research Plan for Optimizing LinkedIn Posts for Recruiter Reach</title>
  <step>
    <goal>Understand the core mechanics of LinkedIn's algorithm that determine post visibility</goal>
    <description>Identify key ranking signals such as engagement velocity, relevance score, and content type weighting</description>
    <query>How does LinkedIn's algorithm determine post reach and what are the main ranking factors</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Determine optimal posting times for content targeting recruiters</goal>
    <description>Find data on when LinkedIn users in professional networks are most active</description>
    <query>Best times to post on LinkedIn to reach recruiters and professionals</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Identify preferred content formats and length for maximum engagement</goal>
    <description>Discover whether short text, long articles, videos, or images perform better with recruiter audiences</description>
    <query>Content format preferences on LinkedIn for professional audiences and optimal post length</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Explore writing style and tone that resonate with recruiters</goal>
    <description>Analyze examples of high‑performing posts aimed at hiring managers and what language patterns they use</description>
    <query>Effective writing style and tone for LinkedIn posts targeting recruiters</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Learn best practices for using hashtags, mentions, and tags to increase recruiter visibility</goal>
    <description>Find guidance on optimal number of hashtags, relevant tagging strategies, and tag placement</description>
    <query>How to use hashtags and mentions on LinkedIn to reach recruiters effectively</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Understand engagement tactics that boost algorithmic amplification after posting</goal>
    <description>Identify strategies such as timely comments, calls‑to‑action, and follow‑up interactions that improve reach</description>
    <query>Post‑publish engagement tactics that enhance LinkedIn post reach among professionals</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Examine case studies or expert analyses of successful recruiter‑focused LinkedIn campaigns</goal>
    <description>Locate real‑world examples or research reports on posts that achieved high recruiter engagement</description>
    <query>Case studies of LinkedIn posts that successfully attracted recruiters and lessons learned</query>
  </step>
  <step>
    <goal>Synthesize findings into an actionable posting checklist</goal>
    <description>Compile the gathered best practices into a concise step‑by‑step optimization checklist</description>
    <query>How to create a LinkedIn posting checklist based on algorithmic best practices for recruiter outreach</query>
  </step>
</research_plan>
